00081 GLAPI void APIENTRY glDeleteFramebuffersEXT (GLsizei s, const GLuint *a)
00082 {
00083     typedef void (APIENTRY *Fun_t)(GLsizei, const GLuint *);
00084     static Fun_t fun = 0;
00085     if (!fun) fun = (Fun_t)wglGetProcAddress("glDeleteFramebuffersEXT");
00086     if (!fun) {
00087         Error() << "glDeleteFramebuffersEXT not found";
00088     } else
00089         fun(s,a);
00090 }
00091 GLAPI void APIENTRY glGenFramebuffersEXT (GLsizei s, GLuint *a)
00092 {
00093     typedef void (APIENTRY *Fun_t)(GLsizei, GLuint *); 
00094     static Fun_t fun = 0;
00095     if (!fun) fun =  (Fun_t)wglGetProcAddress("glGenFramebuffersEXT");
00096     if (!fun) {
00097         Error() << "glGenFramebuffersEXT not found";
00098     } else
00099         fun(s,a);
00100 }
00101 GLAPI GLenum APIENTRY glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT (GLenum e)
00102 {
00103     typedef GLenum (APIENTRY *Fun_t)(GLenum);
00104     static Fun_t fun = 0;
00105     if (!fun) fun = (Fun_t)wglGetProcAddress("glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT");
00106     if (!fun) {
00107         Error() << "glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT not found";        
00108     } else
00109         return fun(e);
00110     return GL_INVALID_FRAMEBUFFER_OPERATION_EXT;
00111 }

00178 struct Frame
00179 {
00180     Frame(unsigned w, unsigned h, unsigned elem_size);
00181     ~Frame() { delete [] mem; mem = 0; texels = 0; }
00182     GLubyte *mem; 
00183     GLvoid *texels; 
00184     unsigned w, h; 
00185     unsigned tx_size; 
00186     unsigned long nqqw; 
00187 
00188     // presently not used..
00189     int ifmt, fmt, type; 
00190     unsigned int seed; 
00191 };
00192 
00193 Frame::Frame(unsigned w, unsigned h, unsigned es): mem(0), texels(0), w(w), h(h), tx_size(es), ifmt(0), fmt(0), type(0), seed(0)
00194 {
00195     unsigned long sz;
00196     sz = MAX(w*h*es + 48, (N+3)*16); // gen_rand_array seems to require at least this much memory.. annoying.
00197     texels = mem = new GLubyte[sz];
00198     nqqw = w*h*es/sizeof(w128_t);
00199     if ( w*h*es%sizeof(w128_t) ) ++nqqw;
00200     if (((unsigned long)texels ) & 0xf)
00201         texels = (GLvoid *)((((unsigned long)mem)+sizeof(w128_t))&~0xf); // align to 16-bytes
00202 }

00212 class FrameCreator : public QThread
00213 {
00214 public:
00215     FrameCreator(CheckerFlicker  & cf);
00216     ~FrameCreator();
00217 
00218     
00219     QSemaphore createMore,  
00220         haveMore; 
00221     std::deque<Frame *> frames; 
00222     QMutex mut; 
00223 
00224     Frame *popOne() { Frame *f; QMutexLocker l(&mut); f = frames.front(); frames.pop_front(); return f; }
00225 
00226     unsigned nWaiting() { QMutexLocker l(&mut); return frames.size(); }
00227 protected:
00229     void run();
00230 private:
00231     CheckerFlicker  & cf;
00232     volatile bool stop;
00233 };

00246 static
00247 bool checkFBStatus()
00248 {
00249     int status = glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT);
00250     switch(status)
00251     {
00252     case GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE_EXT:
00253         return true;
00254 
00255     case GL_FRAMEBUFFER_UNSUPPORTED_EXT:
00256         Error() << "FBO: unsupported error";
00257         return false;
00258 
00259     case GL_INVALID_FRAMEBUFFER_OPERATION_EXT:
00260         Error() << "FBO: invalid framebuffer operation";
00261         return false;
00262 
00263     default:
00264         Error() << "FBO: unknown error";
00265         return false;
00266     }
00267     return true;
00268 }
00269 
00270 bool CheckerFlicker::init()
00271 {
00272     glGetError(); // clear error flag
00273 
00274         const int xdim = w, ydim = h;
00275            // find parameters
00276            // if not found, either set to default value or generate warning message and abort (=return false)
00277            if( !getParam("stixelwidth", stixelWidth) ) stixelWidth = 10;
00278            if( !getParam("stixelheight", stixelHeight) ) stixelHeight = 10;
00279            if( !getParam("blackwhite", blackwhite) ) blackwhite = true;
00280         if( !getParam("quad_fps", quad_fps) ) quad_fps = true;
00281            if( !getParam("meanintensity", meanintensity) ) meanintensity = 0.5;
00282            if( !getParam("contrast", contrast) ){
00283                       if( blackwhite ) contrast = 1;
00284                       else contrast = 0.3f;
00285            }
00286 
00287            if ( !getParam("bx", bx) ) bx = 0;
00288            if ( !getParam("by", by) ) by = 10;
00289            if ( !getParam("bw", bw) ) bw = 45;
00290 
00291            if( !getParam("lmargin", lmargin) ) lmargin = 0;
00292            if( !getParam("rmargin", rmargin) ) rmargin = 0;
00293            if( !getParam("bmargin", bmargin) ) bmargin = 0;
00294            if( !getParam("tmargin", tmargin) ) tmargin = 0;
00295         if( !getParam("fbo", fbo) ) fbo = 0;
00296         if( !fbo && !getParam("prerender", fbo) ) fbo = 0;        
00297         fbos = 0;
00298         if( !getParam("cores", nCoresMax) ) nCoresMax = 2; 
00299         unsigned colortable=1<<17;
00300         if (!getParam("colortable", colortable)) {
00301             // force default of 2^17 colortable size or about 130KB
00302             colortable = 1U<<17;
00303             Warning() << "`colortable' not specified in configuration file, defaulting to colortable=" << colortable;
00304         }
00305         if (colortable <= 24 && colortable > 11) colortable = (1<<colortable);
00306         if (colortable <= 2048 || (colortable&(colortable-1))) {
00307             Error() << "`colortable' parameter of " << colortable << " is invalid.  Try a power of two >2048 (or a number <=24 to auto-compute a power of 2).";
00308             return false;
00309         }
00310         gaussColorMask = colortable-1; // all 1's before the colorTable..
00311         
00312            // make sure that positive values are used
00313            if( stixelWidth < 0 ) stixelWidth *= -1;
00314            if( stixelHeight < 0 ) stixelHeight *= -1;
00315            if( stixelWidth < 1 ) stixelWidth = 1;
00316            if( stixelHeight < 1 ) stixelHeight = 1;
00317            if( lmargin < 0 ) lmargin = 0;
00318            if( rmargin < 0 ) rmargin = 0;
00319            if( bmargin < 0 ) bmargin = 0;
00320            if( tmargin < 0 ) tmargin = 0;
00321            if( lmargin+rmargin >= xdim ){ lmargin = 0; rmargin = 0; }
00322            if( bmargin+tmargin >= ydim ){ bmargin = 0; tmargin = 0; }
00323            if( !getParam( "seed", originalSeed) ) originalSeed = 10000;
00324 
00325            ran1Gen.reseed(originalSeed); // NB: it doesn't matter anymore if seed is negative or positive -- all negative seeds end up being positie anyway and the generator no longer needs a negative seed to indicate "reseed".  That was ugly.  See RanGen.h for how to use the class.. 
00326         gasGen.reseed(originalSeed); // Need to reseed this too.. 
00327         // our SFMT random number generator gets seeded too
00328         init_gen_rand(originalSeed);
00329         gen_rand_all();
00330 
00331            if( !getParam( "Nblinks", Nblinks) ) Nblinks = 1;
00332         blinkCt = 0;
00333         nConsecSkips = 0;
00334            if( Nblinks < 1 ) Nblinks = 1;
00335 
00336         lastAvgTexSubImgProcTime = 0.0045;
00337 
00338            // determine the right number of tiles in x and y direction to fill screen        
00339         do {
00340             xpixels = xdim-(lmargin+rmargin);
00341             ypixels = ydim-(bmargin+tmargin);
00342             if (xpixels < 0 || ypixels < 0) {
00343                 Error() << "Parameters are such that there is no stixel area!";
00344                 return false;
00345             }
00346             Nx = xpixels/stixelWidth;
00347             Ny = ypixels/stixelHeight;
00348             if( xpixels%stixelWidth ) {
00349                 rmargin += xpixels-(Nx*stixelWidth);
00350             }
00351             if( ypixels%stixelHeight ) {
00352                 tmargin += ypixels-(Ny*stixelHeight);            
00353             }
00354         } while ( xpixels%stixelWidth || ypixels%stixelHeight );
00355 
00356         if (!fbo) {
00357             Warning() << "Prerender/fbo not specified -- defaulting to prerender setting of 30 -- Please look into using either `fbo' or `prerender' as a configuration parameter.";
00358             fbo = 30;            
00359         }
00360         
00361         if (fbo < 3) {
00362             Warning() << "Specified <3 prerender frames!  Probably need more than this to be robust.. forcing 3.";
00363             fbo = 3;
00364         }
00365 
00366         ifmt = GL_RGB;
00367         fmt = GL_BGRA;
00368         type = GL_UNSIGNED_INT_8_8_8_8_REV;
00369         initted = false;
00370                       frameGenAvg_usec;
00371 
00372         if (meanintensity < 0. || meanintensity > 1. || contrast < 0. || contrast > 1.) {
00373             Error() << "Either one of: `meanintensity' or `contrast' is out of range.  They must be in the range [0,1]";
00374             return false;
00375         }
00376 
00377                       if (getNProcessors() > 2) {
00378                                  setCurrentThreadAffinityMask(1); // make it run on first cpu
00379                                  Log() << "Set affinity mask of main thread to: " << 1;
00380                       }
00381 
00382         QTime tim; tim.start();
00383         Log() << "Pregenerating gaussian color table of size " << colortable << ".. (please be patient)";
00384         Status() << "Generating gaussian color table ...";
00385         stimApp()->console()->update(); // ensure message is printed
00386         stimApp()->processEvents(QEventLoop::ExcludeUserInputEvents); // ensure message is printed
00387         genGaussColors();
00388         Log() << "Generated " << gaussColors.size() << " colors in " << tim.elapsed()/1000.0 << " secs";
00389         
00390         // fastest, not as compatible on some boards
00391         if (!initFBO()) {
00392             Error() << "FBO initialization failed -- possibly due to lack of support on this hardware or a misconfiguration.";
00393             Error() << "*FBO MODE IS REQUIRED FOR THIS PLUGIN TO WORK*";
00394             return false;
00395         }        
00396         initted = true;
00397            return true;
00398 }
00399 
00400 bool CheckerFlicker::initFBO()
00401 {
00402             if ( !checkFBStatus() ) {
00403                 Error() << "`FBO' mode is selected but the implementation doesn't support framebuffer objects.";
00404                 return false;
00405             }
00406 
00407             glGetError(); // clear error flag
00408             Log() << "`FBO' mode enabled, generating " << fbo << " FBO textures  (please wait)..";
00409             Status() << "Generating texture cache ...";
00410 
00411             stimApp()->console()->update(); // ensure message is printed
00412             stimApp()->processEvents(QEventLoop::ExcludeUserInputEvents); // ensure message is printed
00413             QTime tim;
00414             tim.start();
00415 
00416             cleanupFCs();
00417             FrameCreator *fc = new FrameCreator(*this);
00418             fcs.push_back(fc);
00419             fc->start();
00420 
00421             fbos = new GLuint[fbo];
00422             memset(fbos, 0, sizeof(GLuint) * fbo);
00423             texs = new GLuint[fbo];
00424             memset(texs, 0, sizeof(GLuint) * fbo);
00425             glGenFramebuffersEXT(fbo, fbos);
00426             if ( !checkFBStatus() ) {
00427                 Error() << "Error after glGenFramebuffersEXT call.";
00428                 return false;
00429             }
00430             int err;
00431             if ((err=glGetError())) {
00432                 Error() << "GL Error: " << glGetErrorString(err) << " after call to glGenFramebuffersEXT";
00433                 return false;
00434             }
00435             glGenTextures(fbo, texs);
00436             if ((err=glGetError())) {
00437                 Error() << "GL Error: " << glGetErrorString(err) << " after call to glGenTextures";
00438                 return false;
00439             }
00440             // initialize the off-screen VRAM-based textures
00441             for (unsigned i = 0; i < fbo; ++i) {
00442                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, texs[i]);
00443                 if ((err=glGetError())) {
00444                     Error() << "GL Error: " << glGetErrorString(err) << " after call to glBindTexture";
00445                     return false;
00446                 }
00447                 //glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, GL_RGBA, w, h, 0, GL_BGRA, GL_UNSIGNED_INT_8_8_8_8_REV, NULL);
00448                 // optimization to use less RAM
00449                 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, ifmt, Nx, Ny, 0, fmt, type, NULL);
00450                 if ((err=glGetError())) {
00451                     Error() << "GL Error: " << glGetErrorString(err) << " after call to glTexImage2D";
00452                     return false;
00453                 }
00454                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00455                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00456                 
00457             }
00458             // setup framebuffers-to-texture association
00459             for (unsigned i = 0; i < fbo; ++i) {
00460                 glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, fbos[i]);
00461                 if ((err=glGetError())) {
00462                     Error() << "GL Error: " << glGetErrorString(err) << " after call to glBindFramebufferEXT";
00463                     return false;
00464                 }
00465                  glFramebufferTexture2DEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT,
00466                                            GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT,
00467                                            GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, texs[i], 0);
00468 
00469                 if ((err=glGetError())) {
00470                     Error() << "GL Error: " << glGetErrorString(err) << " after call to glFramebufferTexture2DEXT";
00471                     return false;
00472                 }
00473                 if ( !checkFBStatus() ) {
00474                     Error() << "`FBO' error associating fbo/tex #" << i;
00475                     // Re-enable rendering to the window
00476                     glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, 0);
00477                     return false;
00478                 }
00479 
00480             }
00481             
00482             if ( !checkFBStatus() ) {
00483                 Error() << "`FBO' error after initialization.";
00484                 // Re-enable rendering to the window
00485                 glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, 0);
00486                 return false;
00487             }
00488 
00489             fc->createMore.release(fbo);
00490             for (unsigned i = 0; i < fbo; ++i) {
00491                 // enable rendering to the FBO
00492                 glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, fbos[i]);
00493                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, texs[i]);
00494                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00495                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00496                 glDrawBuffer(GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT); // just to be explicit about which attachment we are drawing to in the FBO
00497                 glPushAttrib(GL_VIEWPORT_BIT);
00498                 glViewport(0, 0, w, h);
00499                 // draw to off-screen texture i
00500                 fc->haveMore.acquire();
00501                 Frame * f = fc->popOne();
00502                 glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, 0, 0, Nx, Ny, fmt, type, f->texels);
00503                 delete f;
00504                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0);
00505                 glPopAttrib();
00506                 // at this point we have a texture with frame i living in VRAM
00507                 // generate a mipmap for quality? nah -- mipmaps not supprted anyway for GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB path
00508                 //glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, texs[i]);
00509                 //glGenerateMipmapEXT(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB);
00510             }
00511             if (getNProcessors() < 2) cleanupFCs(); // no frame creation threads -- do it all in main thread
00512             // Re-enable rendering to the window
00513             glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, 0);
00514             // re-set the drawbuffer
00515             glDrawBuffer(GL_BACK);
00516             
00517             Log() << "FBO texture generation completed in " << tim.elapsed()/1000. << " seconds.";
00518             setNums();
00519             return true;
00520 }
00521 
00522 void CheckerFlicker::cleanupFCs()
00523 {
00524     for (std::vector<FrameCreator *>::iterator fc = fcs.begin(); fc != fcs.end(); ++fc) 
00525         delete *fc;
00526     fcs.clear();
00527 }
00528 
00529 void CheckerFlicker::cleanupFBO()
00530 {
00531     if (fbos || texs) {
00532         if (fbos)
00533             glDeleteFramebuffersEXT(fbo, fbos); // it's weird.. you have to detach the texture from the FBO first, before deleting the texture itself
00534         if (texs)
00535             glDeleteTextures(fbo, texs);
00536         delete [] fbos;
00537         delete [] texs;
00538         fbos = 0;
00539         texs = 0;
00540         Debug() << "Freed " << fbo << " framebuffer objects.";
00541         // Make sure rendering to the window is on, just in case
00542         glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, 0);
00543     } 
00544     fbo = 0;
00545     cleanupFCs();
00546 }
00547 void CheckerFlicker::cleanup() 
00548 {
00549     cleanupFBO();
00550     setNums();    
00551            if (getNProcessors() > 2) {
00552                       setCurrentThreadAffinityMask((1<<getNProcessors())-1); // make it runnable on all CPUs again
00553            }
00554 }
00555 
00556 void CheckerFlicker::genGaussColors()
00557 {
00558     gaussColors.resize(gaussColorMask+1); // reserve data for color table -- gaussColorMask should be <=16MB..
00559     for (unsigned i = 0; i < gaussColors.size(); ++i) {
00560         double d = ((gasGen()*(meanintensity*contrast)) + meanintensity);
00561         if (d < 0. || d > 1.) { --i; continue; } // keep retrying until we get a value in range
00562         gaussColors[i] = static_cast<GLubyte>( d * 256.);
00563         //qDebug("%hhu", gaussColors[i]);
00564     }
00565 }
00566 
00567 
00568 Frame *CheckerFlicker::genFrame(std::vector<unsigned> & entvec)
00569 {
00570     static QMutex rngmut;
00571     double t0 = getTime();
00572 
00573     Frame *f = new Frame(Nx, Ny, 4);
00574     __m128i *quads = (__m128i *)f->texels;
00575     unsigned *dwords = (unsigned *)f->texels;
00576     bool dolocking = fcs.size() > 1;
00577 
00578     if (blackwhite) {
00579         if (dolocking) rngmut.lock();
00580         gen_rand_array((w128_t *)f->texels, MAX(f->nqqw, N));
00581         if (dolocking) rngmut.unlock();
00582 /*        if (quad_fps) {
00583             const __m128i mask = _mm_set_epi32(0, 0, 0, 0);
00584             for (unsigned long i = 0; i < f->nqqw; ++i)
00585                 quads[i] = _mm_cmpgt_epi8(mask, quads[i]);
00586         } else {
00587             const __m128i mask = _mm_set_epi32(0, 0, 0, 0);
00588             for (unsigned long i = 0; i < f->nqqw; ++i)
00589                 quads[i] = _mm_cmpgt_epi32(mask, quads[i]);
00590         }
00591                       */
00592     } else {
00593 #if 1
00594         const unsigned entr_arr_sz = (quad_fps ? f->nqqw*4*3 : f->nqqw*4);
00595         entvec.resize(MAX(entr_arr_sz+8, (N+3)*4));
00596         const unsigned ndwords = f->nqqw*4;
00597         unsigned * entr = reinterpret_cast<unsigned *>((reinterpret_cast<unsigned long>(&entvec[0])+0x10UL)&~0xfUL); // align to 16-byte boundary
00598         if (dolocking) rngmut.lock();
00599         gen_rand_array((w128_t *)entr, MAX(entr_arr_sz/4, N));
00600         if (dolocking) rngmut.unlock();
00601         
00602         // f->seed = whatever here..
00603         if (quad_fps) {
00604             for (unsigned i = 0; i < ndwords; ++i) {
00605                 dwords[i] = getColor(entr[0])|getColor(entr[1])<<8|getColor(entr[2])<<16;
00606                 entr+=3;
00607             }
00608         } else {
00609             for (unsigned i = 0; i < ndwords; ++i) {
00610                 unsigned char cc = getColor(*entr++);
00611                 dwords[i] = cc|cc<<8|cc<<16|cc<<24;
00612             }
00613         }
00614 #endif
00615 #if 0 /* Uses Ziggurat Gaussians.. still not as fast as above method */
00616 #       define CLR static_cast<unsigned char>((ZigguratGauss::generate(gen_rand32, contrast) + meanintensity)*(unsigned char)0xff)
00617         unsigned ndwords = f->nqqw*4;
00618         const double factor = contrast*meanintensity;
00619         if (dolocking) rngmut.lock();
00620         // f->seed = whatever here..
00621         if (quad_fps) {
00622             for (unsigned i = 0; i < ndwords; ++i) {
00623                 dwords[i] = CLR|CLR<<8|CLR<<16;
00624             }
00625 
00626         } else {
00627             for (unsigned i = 0; i < ndwords; ++i) {
00628                 unsigned char cc = CLR;
00629                 dwords[i] = cc|cc<<8|cc<<16|cc<<24;
00630             }
00631         }
00632         if (dolocking) rngmut.unlock();
00633 #       undef CLR
00634 #endif
00635     }
00636     lastFramegen = static_cast<int>((getTime()-t0)*1000.);
00637     const unsigned nFrames = MIN(frameNum, 1000);
00638     frameGenAvg_usec = static_cast<unsigned int>(((double(frameGenAvg_usec) * (nFrames-1)) + lastFramegen*1e3) / double(nFrames));
00639     return f;
00640 }
00641 
00642 void CheckerFlicker::drawFrame()
00643 {
00644     if (!initted) return;
00645            int framestate = (frameNum%2 == 0);
00646 
00647         // using framebuffer objects.. the fastest but not as portable 
00648         // method
00649         if (!blinkCt) takeNum();
00650         if (++blinkCt >= Nblinks) blinkCt = 0, putNum();
00651         glTexEnvf(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_REPLACE);
00652         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB);
00653         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, texs[num]);
00654         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00655         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00656         if (blackwhite) {
00657             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00658             glClearColor(meanintensity, meanintensity, meanintensity, 1.0-contrast);
00659             glBlendFunc(GL_ONE, GL_ZERO);
00660             glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00661             //glBlendColor(0., 0., 0., contrast);
00662             glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00663         } else {
00664             glClearColor(meanintensity, meanintensity, meanintensity, 0.);
00665             glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00666         }
00667         
00668         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00669           if (blackwhite) glColor4f(0., 0., 0., contrast);
00670           glTexCoord2i(0, 0);   glVertex2i(lmargin, bmargin);
00671           glTexCoord2i(Nx, 0);   glVertex2i(w-rmargin, bmargin);
00672           glTexCoord2i(Nx, Ny);   glVertex2i(w-rmargin, h-tmargin);
00673           glTexCoord2i(0, Ny);   glVertex2i(lmargin, h-tmargin);
00674         glEnd();
00675 
00676 
00677         if (blackwhite) glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00678         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB);
00679         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0);
00680 
00681 
00682 
00683            // draw frame tracking flicker box at bottom of grid
00684            // but not for full-field stim
00685            if ((framestate) && (Nx > 1) && (Ny > 1)){
00686                       glColor3f(framestate, framestate, framestate);
00687                       glRecti(bx, by, bx+bw, by+bw);
00688            }
00689 
00690            //if(framestate) pulse = true; // set an event marker on every second frame
00691         // else pulse = false;
00692 
00693 }
00694 
00695 
00696 void CheckerFlicker::setNums()
00697 {
00698     newnums.clear(); oldnums.clear();
00699     for (unsigned i = 0; i < fbo; ++i) oldnums.push_back(i);
00700 }
00701 
00702 void CheckerFlicker::afterVSync(bool isSimulated)
00703 {
00704     if (!initted) return;
00705     QTime tim;
00706     tim.start();
00707     unsigned n = 0, avail = 0, havmor = 0, nwait = 0;
00708     if (!fcs.size()) { 
00709         // single processor mode..
00710         static std::vector<unsigned> hack_entr_vec;
00711         Frame *f = genFrame(hack_entr_vec);
00712         ++n;
00713         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, texs[idx]);
00714         glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, 0, 0, Nx, Ny, fmt, type, f->texels);
00715         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0);
00716         delete f;        
00717         return;
00718     } // else.. multiprocessor mode -- we have at least 1 FrameCreator thread, so harvest frames here
00719 
00720    
00721     const unsigned nQMax = MAX(fbo/fcs.size(),1);
00722     lastAvgTexSubImgProcTime = 0.0;
00723     for (std::vector<FrameCreator *>::iterator fcit = fcs.begin(); fcit != fcs.end(); ++fcit) {
00724         FrameCreator *fc = *fcit;
00725         avail += fc->createMore.available();
00726         havmor += fc->haveMore.available();
00727         nwait += fc->nWaiting();
00728 
00729         if ( fc->nWaiting()+fc->createMore.available() < nQMax)
00730             fc->createMore.release();
00731 
00732         QTime tim2;         
00733         if ( ( fc->haveMore.available() // if there are frames to consume, that is, we won't block
00734                || isSimulated)  // or we are simulated, in which case we are ok with blocking
00735              && blinkCt==0 // only get frames if blinkCt==0 so that we don't lose our frame order
00736              && !newnums.size()) { // only grab frames if our 'queue' is empty
00737             tim2.restart();
00738             unsigned idx = newFrameNum();
00739             
00740             //qDebug("idx %u hwfc %u", idx, (unsigned)getHWFrameCount());
00741             fc->haveMore.acquire(); // NB: doesn't block here, except for isSimulated mode where it does
00742             Frame *f = fc->popOne();
00743             if ( fc->nWaiting()+fc->createMore.available() < nQMax )
00744                 fc->createMore.release();
00745             glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, texs[idx]);
00746             glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, 0, 0, Nx, Ny, fmt, type, f->texels);
00747             glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0);
00748             delete f;
00749             ++n;
00750             
00751             const float secs = tim2.elapsed()/1e3;
00752             lastAvgTexSubImgProcTime += secs;
00753             cycleTimeLeft -= secs;
00754         }
00755         if (isSimulated && n) break; // only loop once for isSimulated mode
00756     }
00757 
00758     if (!n && !nwait)
00759         nConsecSkips++;
00760     else nConsecSkips -= n;
00761     if (nConsecSkips < 0) nConsecSkips = 0;
00762 
00763     if (n) {
00764         lastAvgTexSubImgProcTime /= n; // convert to avg        
00765         //qDebug("fcount: %d xferred %d textures in %d msecs avgTexSubImgTime %g msecs cycletime left %g msecs haveMore %d createMore %d nWaiting %u nConsecSkips %d lastFGenTime: %d msecs", getHWFrameCount(), n, tim.elapsed(), lastAvgTexSubImgProcTime*1e3, cycleTimeLeft*1e3, havmor, avail, nwait, nConsecSkips, lastFramegen); 
00766     }
00767 
00768     if (nConsecSkips >= (int)fbo) {
00769         Warning() << "Possible underrun of frames.  Frame creation thread can't keep up for frame " << getHWFrameCount();
00770         QString s;
00771         s.sprintf("cycletimeleft: %g ms thrdct: %d haveMore: %d createMore: %d nWaiting: %u nConsecSkips: %d lastFramegen: %d ms required: %d ms",  cycleTimeLeft*1e3, fcs.size(), havmor, avail, nwait, nConsecSkips, lastFramegen, int((1e3/getHWRefreshRate())*fcs.size()));
00772         Debug() << s;
00773         // now, create new threads to keep up, if available
00774         int ncoresavail = getNProcessors() - fcs.size() - 1; // allow 1 proc to be used for main thread always
00775         if (ncoresavail < 0) ncoresavail = 0;
00776         if (ncoresavail && fcs.size() < nCoresMax) {
00777             Warning() << "You have " << ncoresavail << " cores available, creating  a new FrameCreator thread to compensate.";
00778             Error() << "CHECKERFLICKER CURRENTLY PRODUCES NON-DETERMINISTIC FRAME ORDERING FOR >1 FRAME CREATOR THREADS!  SET CORES=2 TO AVOID THIS!! FIXME!!";
00779             fcs.push_back(new FrameCreator(*this));
00780             fcs.back()->start();
00781         }
00782         --nConsecSkips;
00783     }
00784     // every 45 frames or so, update custom string
00785     if (!(frameNum%45)) {
00786         customStatusBarString.sprintf("Frame gen. %d ms  Avg. %d usec", lastFramegen, frameGenAvg_usec);
00787     }
00788 }
00789 
00790 FrameCreator::FrameCreator(CheckerFlicker & cf)
00791     : QThread(&cf), cf(cf), stop(false)
00792 {
00793 }
00794 
00795 FrameCreator::~FrameCreator()
00796 {
00797     stop = true;
00798     createMore.release(1);
00799     wait();
00800     mut.lock();
00801     for (std::deque<Frame *>::iterator it = frames.begin(); it != frames.end(); ++it)
00802         delete *it;
00803     frames.clear();
00804     mut.unlock();
00805 }
00806 
00807 void FrameCreator::run()
00808 {
00809     std::vector<unsigned> entropyMem; 
00810     entropyMem.reserve(cf.Nx*cf.Ny*(cf.quad_fps?3:1)+16);
00811 
00812            if (getNProcessors() > 2) {
00813                       unsigned mask = 1<<(cf.fcs.size()%getNProcessors());
00814                       setCurrentThreadAffinityMask(mask); // pin it to one core
00815                       Log() << "Set thread affinity mask to: " << mask;
00816            }
00817 
00818     while (!stop) {
00819         createMore.acquire();
00820         if (stop) return;
00821         Frame *f = cf.genFrame(entropyMem);
00822         mut.lock();
00823         frames.push_back(f);
00824         mut.unlock();
00825         haveMore.release();
00826     }
00827 }
00828 
00829 void CheckerFlicker::save()
00830 {
00831     outStream << "Parameters:" << "\n"
00832               << "stixelwidth = " << stixelWidth << "\n"
00833               << "stixelheight = " << stixelHeight << "\n"
00834               << "blackwhite = " << (blackwhite?"true":"false") << "\n"
00835               << "meanintensity = " << meanintensity << "\n"
00836               << "contrast = " << contrast << "\n"
00837               << "seed = " << originalSeed << "\n"
00838               << "Nblinks = " << Nblinks << "\n"
00839               << "lmargin = " << lmargin << "\n"
00840               << "rmargin = " << rmargin << "\n"
00841               << "bmargin = " << bmargin << "\n"
00842               << "tmargin = " << tmargin << "\n"
00843               << "quad_fps = " << (quad_fps ? "true" : "false") << "\n"
00844               << "fbo = " << fbo << "\n"
00845               << "colortable = " << (gaussColorMask+1) << "\n"
00846               << "cores = " << nCoresMax << "\n"
00847               << "Stats:\n"
00848               << "cores_used = " << (fcs.size()+1) << "\n"
00849               << "last_frame_gen_time_ms = " << lastFramegen << "\n"
00850               << "lastAvgTexSubImgProcTime_secs = " << lastAvgTexSubImgProcTime << "\n";
00851 
00852 }
